mapper.select: SELECT id, passwd, name, mail, phone FROM jaccount WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: update jaccount set passwd = #{passwd}, mail = #{mail}, phone = #{phone} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT A.id, TO_CHAR(A.indate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS indate, A.totprice, B.storename, j.MENUNAME FROM jorder A JOIN jstore B ON A.storeid = B.storeid JOIN JMENU j ON a.MENUID = j.MENUID WHERE A.id = #{id}
select * from jcoupon A join jusercoupon U on A.couponid = U.couponid where U.id=#{id}

SELECT jm.MENUID, jm.storeid, jm.jscateid, jm.menuname, jm.menucontent, jm.img, jm.price, js.JSTORENAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM jmenu WHERE STOREID = jm.STOREID AND JSCATEID = jm.JSCATEID) AS CNT FROM jmenu jm JOIN JSTORECATE js ON jm.STOREID = js.STOREID AND jm.JSCATEID = js.JSCATEID AND jm.STOREID = #{storeid} ORDER BY jscateid, menuid
